metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29958 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: When a download was initiated, the client did not check whether it was innormal or private browsing mode, which led to private mode cookies beingshared in normal browsing mode. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS< 34.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
